channel.title: xunit on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in xunit on Mark Needham

item.title: xUnit.NET: Running tests written in Visual Studio 2010
item.description: I’ve been playing around with F# in Visual Studio 2010 after the Beta 1 release last Wednesday and in particular I’ve been writing some xUnit.NET tests around the twitter application I’ve been working on. A problem I ran into when attempting to run my tests against 'xunit.console.exe' is that xUnit.NET is linked to run against version 2.0 of the CLR and right now you can’t actually change the 'targetframework' for a project compiled in Visual Studio 2010.
